post.html:
We are happy to announce that SAFETAG's methods are now available in Russian, Arabic, and Spanish (updated)!

  • العربية
  • English
  • Español
  • русский

Please give a huge thanks to Localization Lab and their network of expert volunteers.

Also note that we are very close to connecting the SAFETAG repository directly with the Transifex platform to streamline the translation process moving forward. SAFETAG welcomes new content in any language. If you want to create new content in our current non-English languages or add content in a new language, please contact info@SAFETAG.org or submit an issue so we can help get it set up.
